title: Bandit
contents: subtitle | Medium humanoid (any race), any non-lawful
property | Languages | any one language (usually Common)
description | Scimitar | Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.
description | Light Crossbow | Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 80 ft./320ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.
